description: a list of common 5-letter words followed by crossword/thesaurus-style hints for that word

bails: tries to keep the boat afloat
bloop: ball hit just over the infield
cameo: small role for a big star
cough: clear one's throat, in a way
delta: marsh system at the mouth of a river
label: identify
classify
categorize
record company
clothing tag
lives: tries left, in a video game
night: best time to see the moon
remix: new version of an old song
spell: give the letters for a word
title: championship
book name
designation
inherited social rank
